FuncDef: The display virtual-system configuration state command displays whether VS configurations have been saved.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a scenario such as a system reboot or version upgrade, the system must provide information about the VSs whose configurations saved are inconsistent with their current configurations. To check whether the configurations of running VSs have been saved, run the display virtual-system configuration state command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
This command displays information only about running VSs.
